item.title: [CXF-5447] IllegalStateException: Already connected when sending empty POST request
item.description:
I've faced an unexpected behavior testing my app trying to deal with a POST request for a REST service where my message is empty string. In this case, when using a JAXRSClientFactory proxy i get java.lang.IllegalStateException: Already connected when i sent an empty byteArray ... the proxy method never gets called. This does not happens when i sent any content ... the proxy method gets called. I think it could be a bug.

I have test case.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
Fixed, thanks, for now either set "org.apache.cxf.empty.request" in a custom CXF out interceptor or use Async Conduit:
https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/CXF20DOC/JAX-RS+Client+API#JAX-RSClientAPI-SupportforarbitraryHTTPmethodsforsyncinvocations.
